title: Reward Offered for referring me to a T206 Seymour Throwing
author: Blunder19

posts.post_title: Reward Offered for referring me to a T206 Seymour Throwing
posts.post_content:
I have been searching for over a year for a T206 Seymour throwing with the following backs...
Blank Back ... reward $100
Drum back ... reward $200


Anyone who points me in the direction of any of these 3 cards.. if it leads to a sale... I paypal you the reward offered to the right... 

if you own the card.. the reward will be on top of the sale price.

email me at [url]blunder19@aol.com[/url] if you have any info..
Jamie
